caption.center: SHANNON L. McCASLIN, Appellant, v. TODD A. PETERSON, Respondent.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.posture: Appeal from an order of the Supreme Court, Chautauqua County (Paula L. Feroleto, J.), entered February 14, 2005 in a personal injury action. The order granted defendant's motion to dismiss the complaint based on lack of personal jurisdiction.
opinion.attorneys:
THOMAS THEOPHILOS, BUFFALO, FOR PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT.
BOUVIER PARTNERSHIP, LLP, BUFFALO (NORMAN E.S. GREENE OF COUNSEL), FOR DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT.
opinion.panel: Present: Pigott, Jr., P.J., Hurlbutt, Martoche, Pine and Hayes, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: It is hereby ordered that the order so appealed from be andPage 1029 the same hereby is unanimously affirmed without costs for reasons stated in decision at Supreme Court.
